Translations.Text: D Oebbi, s tidep, i Iifen tamurt akked igenwan, ur $ellin ara. Lemmer ad $lin, ur illi yiwen, deffir eS, ara ten iiifen. Neppa, ih, Izga Ieellem, Ipsemmie
Gullen s Oebbi, tagalit meqwoen, ar ma iusa ten id uneddao, ar ad ddun d ubrid, sennig akw leoyus. Mi ten id iusa uneddao, i asen d irna, siwa tugin

tem$weo di tmurt, akked tnaauot tucmip. Ur teppaiiaf tnaauot tucmip, siwa bab is. Day ur muqlen ara ar tannumi imezwura? Ur teppafev, d awez$i, abeddel di tannumi n Oebbi. Ur teppafev ara adewwel di tannumi n Oebbi

Day ur unagen ara di tmurt, ad walin amek tevoa d wid i ten id izwaren? Llan $elben ten tazmert. Ur illi win ara sfunngen Oebbi, s wacemma, deg igenwan, ne$ di tmurt. Neppa, ih, Izga d Amusnaw, d Uzmir
Lemmer Ipqeiii Oebbi imdanen, $ef wayen kesben, ur Ippaooa kra n lxelq sufella n tmurt. Maca, Iswexxio iten, ar lajel ipwassnen. Ma iusa d lajel nnsen, ihi, Oebbi, deg imdanen iS, Izga Ipwali
Is
S Leqwoan uuwib
Kecc, d uuee, ar seg imazanen
ef ubrid uwqim
Tarusi n Uzmir Ipeunun
iwakken a pnedoev agdud; ur pwanedoen imezwura nnsen, d$a stehzan
Ni$ iuao wawal, $ef tegwti degsen, d$a ur uminen
Ih, Nurez iten si tmegoav ar tmira, d$a ndellen, ur iiinizen
Nerra aedid zdat sen, aedid deffir sen. Nesbur asen, ihi ur pwalin
Iauva fellasen: ama tnubav ten, ne$ ur ten tnubav; ur ppamnen
Nabi kan wid iiiafaoen asmekti, ippagwaden Aenin, di tbavnit. Ihi, becceo it s ssmae, akked warraz ukyis
Ih, Nekwni Nessidir lmeggtin. Nepparu ayen xeddmen akked lateo nnsen. Neeseb yal cci di Tezmamt ipbegginen
Awi asen d amedya: at temdint, mi ten id usan imazanen
Mi sen Nuzen sin, nekoen ten. Null s wis krav. Nnan: "nekwni d imazanen $uowen
Nnan: "kunwi d imdanen kan, am nekwni. Aenin ur d Issers acemma. Kunwi, teskiddibem kan
Nnan: "Mass nne$ Ieoa, s tidep, ar $uowen id neppuceggaa
Ay fella$ kan d timenna ipbegginen
Nnan: "war ccekk, tesskeesem a$. Ma ur teebisem ara, a kwen neooem, u a nessuk fellawen, aaaqeb aqeoean
Nnan: "lkees nnwen yidwen. Day imi i kwen smektin? Maca, kunwi d agdud amaafun
Iusa d si ieof ibaaden n temdint, urgaz s tazzla. Inna: "a yagdud iw! Ddut d imazanen
Ddut d wid ur awen d nessuter taqviat, nitni pwanhan
Amek ur aabde$ ara Win iyi d Ixelqen, u $uoeS tu$alin nnwen
Day ad sau$, war Neppa, ioebbiten? Ur iyi d teppawi acemma cafuaa nnsen, ma Irad iyi Uenin ccqa; ur iyi pselliken
Yili nek, war ccekk, di ttelfan n uuee
Nek, umne$ s Mass nnwen. Ihi selt iyi d
Nnan as: "ekcem ar Loennet"! Inna: "anna$, a lemmer ad ieeo ugdud iw
amek iyi Isemmee Mass iw, u Irra yi seg imaazuzen
